transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello Gagan ji namaskar.
Customer: Namaskar sir.
Executive: Kaise hai Rahul baat kar raha tha actually company ka number mera ye.
Customer: Rahul sir.
Executive: Boliye boliye.
Customer: Mai system pe hu lekin thodi der me call back aap apna number bhi call kar dijiye isi number pe call karne isi number pe call back karu.
Executive: Mere personal number pe kar lo koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Is wale number pe karu to.
Executive: Koi na kar lo koi baat nahi kisi me kar lo.
Customer: Ha thik hai abhi mai karta hu aapko.
Customer: Thik hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive needs to call back later.



Resolution:

- Customer shared his personal number for callback.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer back.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- callback, personal number, company number
